title: 105 Ashobora Gukiza
markdown:
### 105 Ashobora Gukiza   

  **1**   
 Ashobora gukiza! Mubyamamaze hose; Ashobora gukiz' umwumvira wese, Akamwarura mu murir' ugurumana. Yes' ashobora gukiza ushaka wese.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Ashobora kugukiza, No kukurokor' ubu; Mwene Data n' umwizera, azagukiza.

  **2**   
Ashobora gukiza! Mbese n' ukuri koko? Ahw' afit' imbarag' ibasha kunkiza? Mbwira, nyamuna mbwira, Mbese Kristo wishwe, Yashobora kumbohora, akandokora? 

  **3**   
Ashobora gukiza! Mugenzi we komera! N' uyoboka Yesu azakurokora. Ntugatinye Satani, Jy' ugundira Yesu; Reka kujy' ushidikanya, Jy' umwiringira.

title: 106 Twubake Ku Rutare Rw' Iteka
markdown:
### 106 Twubake Ku Rutare Rw' Iteka   

  **1**   
 Twubake ku Rutare rw' iteka, Nirwo Yes' umucunguzi; Nibwo tuzabasha gushikama, Umugaru n' utera.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
   Sop : Twubake kuri we, Twubake kuri we; Twubake ku Rutare rw' iteka, Nirwo Yes' Umwami.
    A.T.B : Twubake kuri we, Niwe Rutare; Twubake kuri we, Niwe Rutare; Twubake ku Rutare rw' iteka, Nirwo Yes' Umwami.

  **2**   
Harihw' abubaka ku musenyi, Barangamiy' iby' iyi si; Abandi bubaka ku muraba w' ibyaha no kwikuza. 

  **3**   
Twubake ku Rutare rw' ukuri, Nirwo rushikam' iteka. Kurwiringira kuzahoraho, Nirwo gakiza kacu.

title: 107 Menyesh' Ibya Yesu Byose
markdown:
### 107 Menyesh' Ibya Yesu Byose   

  **1**   
 Menyesh' ibya Yesu byose, Maz' ubinyandikemo; Mbwir' ibye by' ingenzi byose, Nezezwa no kubyumva. Mbwir' ukw' abamarayika baririmbye yavutse, Ngw' Icyubahiro ku Mana, Amahoro abe mu b' isi.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Menyesh' ibya Yesu byose, Maz' ubinyandikemo. Mbwir' ibye by' ingenzi byose, Nezezwa no kubyumva.

  **2**   
Mbwira n' ibyo mu butayu, N' iminsi yahamaze; N' uburyo yageragejwe, Agatsind' ibishuko; Mbwira n' iby' imirimo ye, Vug' uko yababajwe; Agahemurwa bamwanze, Agahinyurwa nk' impabe. 

  **3**   
Mbwir' iby' umusaraba we, Uwo bamubambyeho, Mbwira n' aho bamuhambye, Mbwira n' uko yazutse, N' urukundo ruhebuje, Ntacyo narugeraho. Dore, ndababaye, mbwira iby' urukundo rwancunguye.

title: 108 Yes' Umwungeri Mwiza
markdown:
### 108 Yes' Umwungeri Mwiza   

  **1**   
 Yes' Umwungeri mwiza, Aragutarura, Ngo winjire mw' ishyo rye; Nih' uzaruhukira. Ngwin' ugif' ubusore, Ngwin' ukiri muto; Injir' uzarindwa rwose, Ntuzagir' icy' uganya.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Aragutaruran' urukundo, ati: Wa mpabe we, ngwino nsanga. Dor' Umukiz' arategereje, Yes' Umwungeri wanjye

  **2**   
Yes' Umwungeri mwiza, Yarakwitangiye; Araguhamagara ati: Nyabuna ngwino, Gira bwang' uve mu kaga, Ntugumye, kwijyana. Injir' uzarindwa rwose, Wibere mu mahoro. 

  **3**   
Reka kuragiriza, Isega yateye, Ishak' intama zose, Zazimiriye kure. Arik' Umwungeri mwiza, Arakuburira; Injir' uzarindwa rwose, Muban' akaramata.

title: 109 Naratuwe Mu Gipimo
markdown:
### 109 Naratuwe Mu Gipimo   

  **1**   
 Umucamanza n' agera, Akarondor' ibyacu, Tuzamera nk' izahabu, Cyangwa s' inkamb' itabwa?

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Naratuwe mu gipimo, Nsangwa ntashyitse; Naratuwe n' ijambo rye, Nsangwa ntashyitse.

  **2**   
Mbese tuzumv' ishimwe ngo: Nuko, wakoze neza; Cyangw' iteka ryo gupfa ngo: Mwasanzwe mudashyitse? 

  **3**   
Nimutyo twite kw' ijwi rye, Igihe kikiriho. Tureke gutindiganya, Tumaramaze rwose.

title: 110 Wumv' Amagambo Y' Umukiza
markdown:
### 110 Wumv' Amagambo Y' Umukiza   

  **1**   
 Wumv' amagambo y' Umukiza; Niy' aguhesh' ubugingo. Wa munyabyaha we, menya ko hahirw' abakomez' amategeko.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Hahirw' abayakomeza yose, Nibo bahirwa, barahirwa; Hahirw' abayakomeza yose, Barahirwa, barahirwa.

  **2**   
Kuyumva gusa nta kamaro, N'ukutugwabiza rwose; Kuyumva dutinya, ntibyadukiza, Hahirw' abayumvira yose. 

  **3**   
Bazinjiran' umunezero mu mudugudu w' Imana, Ahatab' ishavu n' umubabaro, Beger' igiti cy' ubugingo.

title: 111 Nta Nshuti Nziz' Ihwanye Na Yesu
markdown:
### 111 Nta Nshuti Nziz' Ihwanye Na Yesu   

  **1**   
 Nta nshuti nziz' ihwanye na Yesu; Nta n' imwe! nta n' imwe! Nta wundi wabasha kudukiza; Nta wundi! nta wundi!

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Yes' az' ibiturushya byose; Azabana natw' iteka. Nta ncuti nziz' ihwanye na Yesu, Nta n' imwe! nta n' imwe!

  **2**   
Nta nshut' ibahw' ikomeye nka we; Nta n' imwe! nta n' imwe! Nyamara nta wiyoroshya nka we; Nta n' umwe! nta n' umwe! 

  **3**   
Nta kanya na gato tutabana; Ye nta ko! ye nta ko! Nta joro ryira tutari kumwe; Ye nta ryo! ye nta ryo! 

  **4**   
Mbese har' uwo yigez' ahana? Nta n' umwe! Nta n' umwe! Mbese har' umunyabyah' aheza? Nta n' umwe! nta n' umwe! 

  **5**   
Harihw' impano yahwana nawe? Nta n' imwe! nta n' imwe! Mbese har' uwo yavuts' ijuru? nta n' umwe! nta n' umwe!

title: 112 Kurabukw' Umusaraba Wawe
markdown:
### 112 Kurabukw' Umusaraba Wawe   

  **1**   
 Kurabukw' umusaraba wawe, Mwami nibyo byambeshaho; Sinita ku manjwe y' iby' isi, Ntez' agakiza ku musaraba.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
   S. : Kurabukw' i Golgota, Nibyo bizambeshaho. Mbeg' amahirwe yanjye, Yo kurabukwa Yesu!
    A., T. na B. : Kurabu … Go… Golgota, Nibyo bi … mbe … mbeshaho. Mbeg' amahirwe yanjye…rwe yanjye, Yo kurabukwa Yesu! …rabukwa Yesu.

  **2**   
Ubwo nari nkibon' Umukiza, Yanyakirany' ibyishimo; Na n' ubu ningir' ibindwanya, Kumurabukwa nibyo byankiza. 

  **3**   
Nzajya mpang' amas' umusaraba, Kandi mwiringire rwose. Nta wutumbir' umusaraba, Wari wiger' aneshwa n' Umwanzi.

title: 113 Yesu Araguhamagaran' Ituza
markdown:
### 113 Yesu Araguhamagaran' Ituza   

  **1**   
 Yes' araguhamagaran' ituza, Ub' arahamagara; Ategereje k' umwiyegurira, We kuzuyaza; ngwino.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Ngwino ( ngwino); Ngwino (ngwino); Abarushye mwese nimuze. Yes' araguhamagaran' ituza, ati: Mukundwa, ngwino.

  **2**   
Twatinzwa n' iki, kand' ategereje kuturokora twese? Twahinyuzwa n' ik' imbabazi zose adufitiye twese? 

  **3**   
Twakererew' ibihe birahita, Aradutegereje; Turarindagirira mu mwijima; Nimutyo tumusange. 

  **4**   
Zirikan' urukundo ruhebuje, Yadusezeranije; N' ubwo twagomye, Tuzababarirwa; Aradutegereje.

title: 114 Har' Irembo RyuguruyeH
markdown:
### 114 Har' Irembo Ryuguruye   

  **1**   
 Har' irembo ryuguruwe, Ryatumye mpishurirwa. Umusaraba wa kure, Yesu yatangiyeho.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Mbeg' ineza n' imbabazi byatumye nugururirwa! Nugururiwe, Iman' ihimbazwe!

  **2**   
Irembo ryugururiwe abashak' agakiza; Ngw' abakire n' abakene bose barinyuremo. 

  **3**   
Nshuti komez' utwaran' irembo ricyuguruwe. Ikorer' umusaraba; Nibw' uzahabw' ikamba. 

  **4**   
Tumaze kwambuk' uruzi, Dute wa musaraba; Twambikw' amakamba meza, Twitahire mw' ijuru.

title: 115 Umukiz' Ageze HafiH
markdown:
### 115 Umukiz' Ageze Hafi   

  **1**   
 Umukiz' ageze hafi, Yes' Umukunzi wanjye. Yazanywe no guhembura; Mwese nimumwumvire.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Nta wuhwany' izina nawe, Rirut' amazina yose. Nta wusingizwa nkawe; Yesu mwiza rwose.

  **2**   
Icyubahiro kib' icye; Mutyo twizere Yesu. Nkund' izina ry' Umukiza; Nkund' izina rya Yesu. 

  **3**   
Izina rye rirankiza, Rikamar' agahinda. Nta kinezeza nko kumva, Iryo zina rya Yesu. 

  **4**   
N' az' azatugororera, Ikamba ry' ubugingo. Ubwo nibwo tuzicara, Tuvug' iby' agakiza.

title: 116 Ntacyo Wasigiye Yesu
markdown:
### 116 Ntacyo Wasigiye Yesu   

  **1**   
 Dor' umutima wawe, Wuzuyemw' amaganya. Nta mwanya wasigiye Yesu ngo yinjiremo? Ub' ahagaze ku rugi, Arakomanga yinginga. Nta mwanya wasigiye Yesu ngo yinjiremo?

  **2**   
Upfush' igih' ubusa, Kand' ar' ingenzi rwose. Mbese nta mwany' ufite wo gukorera Yesu? Nturarushy' ugerageza gutarur' abazimiye; Mbese nta mwany' ufite wo gukorera Yesu? 

  **3**   
Mbese k' umaranira kwishakir' ubutunzi, Nta gih' ufite washishikarir' ibya Yesu? Dor' uharanira kwikubir' ibinezeza by' isi; Nta gih' ufite washishikarir' ibya Yesu? 

  **4**   
Wabay' ingumba nk' igiti cy' ibibabi gusa. Mbese ntabwo wazerer' Umwami Yes' imbuto? Ntacy' ufite cyo kuzamumurikira n' agaruka; Mbese ntabwo wazerer' Umwami Yes' imbuto?

title: 117 Mwami Ndumv' Ijwi Ryawe
markdown:
### 117 Mwami Ndumv' Ijwi Ryawe   

  **1**   
 Mwami ndumv' ijwi ryawe, Rindarika ngo nze, Nuhagizwe ya maraso, Wamviriye kera.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Mukiza ndaje, Ubu nj' ah' uri! Nyejesha ya maraso, Wamviriye kera.

  **2**   
N' ubwo nje nahindanye, Ntunyirengagize; Ahubw' umboneze rwose, Mb' umweru waka de. 

  **3**   
Yesu niw' unkomeza, Niw' umpa gutsinda; Ng' urukundo n' amahoro, Binsabemo rwose. 

  **4**   
Mwese nimwishimire! Ya maras' akiza, Yatwujuje na Rurema, Ngo tub' abana be.

title: 118 Ndumv' Umukiz' Ambwira
markdown:
### 118 Ndumv' Umukiz' Ambwira   

  **1**   
 Ndumv' Umukiz' ambwira, Ko mbuz' imbaraga; Ngo: Njye museng' iteka, Ntacyo nzamuburana.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Yanndihiriye imyenda yose; Yambabariy' ibyaha, Bihinduk' umweru.

  **2**   
Niw' ufit' imbaraga, Zihagije rwose; Zo gukiz' ababembe, Zikoroshy' umutima. 

  **3**   
Ubwo nta cyiza nkora, Nibesherejweho; N' ubuntu bwawe gusa, Ni wowe nkesha byose. 

  **4**   
Imbere ya ya ntebe, Nzahahagarara; Nzaba njyany' iminyago, Nyishyikirize Yesu.

title: 119 Harihw' Isokw' Itukura
markdown:
### 119 Harihw' Isokw' Itukura   

  **1**   
 Harihw' isokw' itukura, Ivamw' amaraso;Niy' Umwami yamviriye, Ngw' ayandokoreshe.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Nduz' umuvu w' amaraso; Ndayogamo nere rwose! Haleluya! Aranyeza, Aranyeza, Aranyeza!

  **2**   
Mpinduts' icyaremwe gishya, Mbyaw' ubwa kabiri. Ntsinze kamere ya kera, Nzahora ndi mushya. 

  **3**   
Nsigaye mvirwa n' umucyo, Sinkirindagira; Nshitse ku ngoyi z' umwanzi, Mbatuwe na Yesu. 

  **4**   
Mbeg' ubuntu butangaje! Kwejeshw' amaraso! Byanyujuje n' Umukiza, Yesu wambambiwe.

title: 120 Data Ndambuy' Amaboko
markdown:
### 120 Data Ndambuy' Amaboko   

  **1**   
 Data, ndambuy' amaboko; Nta wundi wamfasha; Iy' unyivumburiy' ukamvaho, Mbes' ahandi najya ni he?

  **2**   
Nizey' Umwana waw' ubu, Undem' umutima; Ujy' unkenur' umar' ubukene, Nkomeze nemerwe nawe. 

  **3**   
Nyir' ukwizera ni wowe, Nuburiy' amaso; Icyamp' ukangwiriza kwizera, Kuko ntagufite napfa. 

  **4**   
Ntuzantererane ngo mpfe, Ahubw' umbesheho; Nibwo nzacika ku kinyoma, Mbishobojwe n' Umwuka wawe. 

  **5**   
Nakwishima cyane rwose, Nibaniye nawe; Maze nkakumv' umpumuriz' umbwira ko nagiriw' ubuntu. 

  **6**   
Nizeye rwos' ubu yuko, Yesu yampfiriye; Kandi kubw' amaraso ye yeza, Nzabaturwa mve mu byaha.

title: 121 Nzasingiz' Urukundo Rwa Yesu
markdown:
### 121 Nzasingiz' Urukundo Rwa Yesu   

  **1**   
 Nzasingiz' urukundo rwa Yesu, Wambambiwe; Yemeye kumanuka, Azanywe no kumpfira.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Nzasingiz' urukundo rwe; Mpimbaze, Yaramfiriye, Ashaka kumbeshaho; Nzahora muhimbaza.

  **2**   
Yesu yambabarijwe, Ntararushya mbabara; Yahoze ansabira, Ntarameny' iyo bijya. 

  **3**   
Urukundo rw' Imana, Mbega ngo rurankiza! Ibyaha byanjye byose, Bikantamururwaho! 

  **4**   
Nta cyiza nakoreye, Umwami wankunz' atyo; None maze kwemezwa, Mwami nguhaye byose.

title: 122 Nyigiza Hafi
markdown:
### 122 Nyigiza Hafi   

  **1**   
 Nyigiza hafi, mbane nawe; Nta cyandutira kubana nawe. Ngumisha mu gituza cyawe; Mpisha nibere mu buhungiro; Mpisha nibere mu buhungiro.

  **2**   
Nyigiza hafi, ntacyo mfite; Ntacyo nzanyehw' ituro ry' Umwami, Kerets' umutim' ushavuye; Mpa kuhagizw' amaraso yawe; Mpa kuhagizw' amaraso yawe. 

  **3**   
Nyigiza hafi, Mwami wanjye; Nishimiye gucika ku byaha. Ndeke kwikuza n' ubwibone; Umpe Yes' Umwami wambambiwe; Umpe Yes' Umwami wambambiwe. 

  **4**   
Nyigiza hafi, ngihumeka; Kugez' ubwo nzager' i Budapfa; Maze mu bihe bidashira, Nzibere hafi y' Umwami wanjye; Nzibere hafi y' Umwami wanjye.

title: 123 Har' Izina Rihebuje
markdown:
### 123 Har' Izina Rihebuje   

  **1**   
 Har' izina rihebuje, Rirut' ayandi yose nzi; Ni ry' Imana yaturemye yis' Umwana way' ikunda.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Ni ryo zina ryera (izina ); Ni ryo zina ryera ( ryera de ) ! Ryakomotse ku Mana, Riza mw isi, Maze riririmbwa ( izina ) n' abamarayika ( ryera de ). Iryo zina n' irya Yesu.

  **2**   
Niryo rimpesh' umugisha; Nkunda kuryogez' iteka. Simpwema kuriririmba, Mvug' ukuntu rihebuje. 

  **3**   
Icyampa nkaririmbana n' abamarayika bera, Nkajya nsingiza rya zina rihebuj' ayandi yose!

title: 124 Yesu Gusa
markdown:
### 124 Yesu Gusa   

  **1**   
 Yesu gusa, niw' ukwiriy' ikuzo; Naho jyewe, ntacyo ndi cyo rwose; Sinkwiriye kub' ari jyew' uratwa; Yesu gusa, niw' uzajy' uvugwa.

  **2**   
Yesu gusa, niw' umar' agahinda; Naho jyewe nd' uwo gushavura. Sinshobora kwikorer' ibindushya; Naho Yesu nta kimushengura. 

  **3**   
Yesu gusa, ab' ari we wogezwa; Sinkwiriye kwiratan' ibyanjye. Yesu gusa, niw' uzambonekamo; Kugez' ubwo nzahinduka nka we. 

  **4**   
Yesu gusa niw' umar' ubukene; Niwe gusa nkesh' ibyanjye byose. Yesu gusa, niw' undutira byose; Yesu Mwami twibanir' iteka.

title: 125 Nk' Ukw' Izuba Rituvira
markdown:
### 125 Nk' Ukw' Izuba Rituvira   

  **1**   
 Nkukw' izuba rituvira, Rikarabagirana, Nik' umucyo wo mw' ijuru wansabye mu mutima, Wawukuyemw' iby' amanjwe, Utangaz' ibihishwe; Kuko mu mutima wanjye, Nahatuj' Umukiza.
 Gusubiramo: Mbeg' umucyo w' agatangaza, Wansabye mu mutima! Ineza y' Umwami Yesu, Yambereye nk' umucyo.

  **2**   
Natay' agahinda kose; Ntabwo nkikitayeho;Kuk' unyambik' amahoro, Ameze nk' umwitero,Nkwerekejeh' umutima, Ndakwishimiye cyane.Nzagezw' i wawe mw' ijuru, Na rwa rukundo rwawe. 

  **3**   
Mukiza warancunguye; Nd' uwaw' uko ndi kose. Nyemerera nguhimbaze, Nkuber' umucyo waka. Nkwerekejeh' umutima, Ndakwishimiye cyane. Nzagezw' i wawe mw' ijuru, Na rwa rukundo rwawe.

title: 126 Njya Nkunda Kuririmb'Indirimbo
markdown:
### 126 Njya Nkunda Kuririmb'Indirimbo   

  **1**   
 Njya nkunda kuririmb' indirimbo, Ngo yarancunguye. Niwe waciy' ingoyi z' umwanzi, Maz' arambatura.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
   Sop: Kuk' ubwe yancunguye; Kuk' ubwe yancunguye, Nzahimbaz' izina rye. Kuk' ubwe yancunguye, Nzaririmbir' uwandokoye.
    A.T.B.: Kuk' ubwe yancunguye; Kuk' ubwe yancunguye; Kuk' ubwe yancunguye, Nzahimbaz' izina rye. Kuk' ubwe yancunguye, Kuk' ubwe yancunguye; Nzaririmbir' uwandokoye.

  **2**   
Mfit' Umukiz' unogeye rwose, Niwe wancunguye. Mpimbazwa no gukor' iby' ashaka, Kuko yancunguye. 

  **3**   
Nzahora mpamya ntacyo nikenga, Yuko yancunguye. Sinzashidikanya ngo ncogore, Kuko yancunguye. 

  **4**   
Mfit' aho yanteguriye heza, Kuko yancunguye. Niho nzibanira naw' iteka, Kuko yancunguye.

title: 127 Iman' Ikund' Utunyoni
markdown:
### 127 Iman' Ikund' Utunyoni   

  **1**   
 Iman' ikund' utunyoni, Tuba mur' iyi si; Ubwo yita ku tunyoni, Nzi ko nanjy' inkunda.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Irankunda, irankunda; Nzi ko nanjy' inkunda; Kukw' ikund' utuntu duto, Nzi ko nanjy' inkunda.

  **2**   
Niy' irimbish' uburabyo, Buhumura neza; Ubw' ikund' uburaby' ityo, Nzi ko nanjy' inkunda. 

  **3**   
Imana yaremye byose, Ntigir' icy' isobwa. Nzi kw' ikund' abana bose, Nzi ko nanjy' inkunda.

title: 128 N' Igihe Cyo Gusengat
markdown:
### 128 N' Igihe Cyo Gusenga
  **1**   
 N' igihe cyo gusenga, Twicishe bugufi, Duteraniye hamwe turamya Yesu, Nituza tumwizeye, Azajy' aturinda; Mbeg' ihumure ryiza, ryo kwibanira nawe

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
N' igihe cyiza cyo kuramy' Umwami, Mbeg' ihumure ryiza, ryo kwibanira na we!

  **2**   
N' igihe cyo gusenga, Umwam' ari hafi, Kand' adufitiy' ibambe rya kibyeyi. Tumuganyir' ibyacu, Dushir' agahinda; Mbeg' ihumure ryiza, ryo kumvikana nawe! 

  **3**   
N' igihe cyo gusenga, no gushyikirana, N' Imana yac' ihor' ituzirikana, Iturem' agatima, tub' indahangarwa; Mbeg' ihumure ryiza, ryo kumvikana nawe! 

  **4**   
N' igihe cyo gusenga, twiringiye Yesu. Twizeye kw' azaduh' ibyo, tumusaba, Kukw' atangan' ubuntu, ataziganije. Mbeg' ihumure ryiza, ryo gutabarwa nawe!

title: 129 Yesu Waduhay' Isezerano
markdown:
### 129 Yesu Waduhay' Isezerano   

  **1**   
 Yesu waduhaye isezerano, K' uzabana natwe, niduterana, Naho twaba babiri, Cyangwa batatu, Uzab' uri kumwe n' abana bawe.
 Gusubiramo: Yesu, ngwin' uduhire, Tutarava hano; Yesu ngwin' uduhire ubu, Tuban' iteka.

  **2**   
Wateranye natwe, mu bindi bihe, Ariko na n' ubu turakwifuza. Ngwino, Mubyeyi mwiza, Turakwinginze; Twumvir' utwemere, Duhirwe nawe. 

  **3**   
Wakir' indirimbo z' ishimwe ryacu, Uduhe gusenga tubyitayeho. Twongerere kwizera, No kwiringira; Dukundane rwose, Dushyire hamwe.

title: 130 Nd' Uwawe, Mwami
markdown:
### 130 Nd' Uwawe, Mwami   

  **1**   
 Nd' uwawe Mwami, Ubu nditanze; Numvis' ubury' udukunda. Nsingiriz' amabok' untabare, Njye nibanire nawe.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
   S.A : Hafi yawe, Nibyo nifuza, Ku musaraba wawe. Hafi yawe, Mwami, tuban' iteka, Njye nibanira nawe.
    T.B : Hafi yawe cyane, ni byo nifuza, Ku musaraba wawe. Hafi yawe, Mwami, Tuban' iteka, Njye nibanira nawe.

  **2**   
Nkwiyeguriye namaramaje, Nkoresh' umurimo wawe; Nkwerekejeh' umutima wanjye, Ng' uhor' ugengwa nawe. 

  **3**   
Kubana nawe birahebuje, Nibyo bindutira byose. Iyo mpfukamye, nkakuganyira, Dusabana nk' inshuti. 

  **4**   
Sinashobora kukurondora, Ngo mmeny' urukundo rwawe. Ruzahishurwa turi mw' ijuru, Aho twateguriwe.

title: 131 Ndusheho Gusa Nawe
markdown:
### 131 Ndusheho Gusa Nawe   

  **1**   
 Ndusheho gusa nawe, Yesu Mukiza wanjye; Nyuzuz' ubugwaneza, Mp' urukundo ruhebuje. Ndusheho kumera nkawe, Aho ngenda hose, Mwami; Ndiyoroheje rwose, Mwami njye ngukurikiza.

  **2**   
Nib' irind' icyanira, Ikamenya n' igishwi; Sinshidikanya rwose, Nanjy' ihor' inyitayeho. Izanyigisha kwitonda, Imbabarir' amafuti; Ndiyoroheje rwose, Mwami njye ngukurikiza. 

  **3**   
Ndusheho gusa nawe, Ndusheh' uko bukeye; Nyigiza hafi yawe, Ahw' amahor' adashira. Uhor' umpindura mushya, Kubw' urukund' ungirira; Ndiyoroheje rwose, Mwami njye ngukurikiza.

title: 132 Yesu, Unkomereze Ku Musaraba
markdown:
### 132 Yesu, Unkomereze Ku Musaraba   

  **1**   
 Yes' unkomereze, Ku musaraba wawe; Har' isokw' ibeshaho, Itemb' i Kal'vari.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Umusaraba wa Yesu nzawirata, Kugez' ubwo nzabona uburuhukiro.

  **2**   
Hafi y' umusaraba, Mpaboner' iteka, Imbabazi n' impuhwe, Bitarondoreka. 

  **3**   
Hafi y' umusaraba, Intama y' Imana, Niyo yahangejeje, Ntsind' ibimbabaza. 

  **4**   
Hafi y' umusaraba, Niho ntegereje; Niringiye kugera, Mu bwami bw' Imana.

title: 133 Nyemerera Ngendane Nawe
markdown:
### 133 Nyemerera Ngendane Nawe   

  **1**   
 Nyemerera ngendane nawe, Mana, Nk' ukw' Enoki yagenje. Nyoboresh' ukuboko kwawe, Unyerekez' ah' ushaka hose. Nubw' inzir' itagaragara, Nkomeze njyane nawe, Mwami.

  **2**   
Ntabwo nahangara kugenda, Ntari kumwe nawe, Mukiza; Nagoswe n' abanz' igihumbi; Dor' imitegw' intaye hagati. Burije rwose, ntihabona, Nkomeze njyane nawe, Mwami. 

  **3**   
Ninguma mu maboko yawe, Sinzaba ncyitaye ku by' isi; Nta kindi nziratana rwose, Keretse wa musaraba wawe, Ngez' ubwo nzager' i Siyoni, Nkomeze njyane nawe, Mwami.

title: 134 Icyampa Nkarangurura
markdown:
### 134 Icyampa Nkarangurura   

  **1**   
 Icyampa nkarangurura, Ngahimbaz' Umwami wanjye, Ariko ni nde wabasha kuririmb' ishimwe rya Yesu?

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Urukundo ruhebuje! Urukundo rwa Yesu! Urukundo ruhebuje! Urukundo rwa Yesu!

  **2**   
Niwe munezero wanjye, Ni naw' umpesh' amahoro. Mu makuba no mu byago, Yesu niw' umber' ihumure. 

  **3**   
Niwe byiringiro byanjye, Byo kuzahabw' ubugingo. Mu mwijim' amber' umucyo, Yesu niw' umber' ihumure.

title: 135 Mwami Nzi Kw' Ari We Nkunda
markdown:
### 135 Mwami Nzi Kw' Ari We Nkunda   

  **1**   
 Mwami, nzi kw' ari We nkunda, Kurut' iby' iyi si; Kuko wampay' amahoro, Atagir' impinduka.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Urukundo rwankijije (ngakira), Ntirurondoreka. Ntitwarusobanukirwa (na hato), Kuko ruhebuje (ruhebuje).

  **2**   
Nzi k' uhor' unzirikana, Undutira byose, Mwami, kugutekereza bindutir' ibyiratwa. 

  **3**   
Wanyujuj' umunezero, Natay' umuruho. Kumenya k' unkunda cyane, Nibyo bimpumuriza. 

  **4**   
Mucunguzi wanjye mwiza, Icyakunyereka! Ngo tuzabane mw' ijuru, Ahatab' agahinda.

title: 136 Ahw' Azanyobora Hose
markdown:
### 136 Ahw' Azanyobora Hose   

  **1**   
 Ahw' azanyobora hose, Niho nzishimira kujya; Kukw' ari jye yapfiriye, Akanzir' atacumuye.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Yes' azanyobor' iteka, Maz' angez' iw' amahoro; Kukw' ar' inshuti y' ukuri, Itigeze guhemuka.

  **2**   
Nishimira kw' antegeka, Nishimira kw' anyobora. Nishimira kumwumvira, Kukw' ari jye yapfiriye. 

  **3**   
Singishidikanya rwose, Kuko ndi kumwe na Yesu. Nizigiye ko vub' aha, Nzamureba duhanganye.

title: 137 Isi Ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu
markdown:
### 137 Isi Ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu   

  **1**   
 Isi ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu gusa.Mpaz' umunezero wayo, Uzashirana nayo.
   Gusubiramo: Imbabazi zidashira, N' urukundo rw' iteka, Nibyo bijya binyemeza, Ko nzaramishwa nawe.

  **2**   
Isi ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu gusa. Mu kaga niwe humure; Nzahora nezerewe. 

  **3**   
Isi ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu gusa. Icyamp' akamwenyurira, Nkamurikirwa nawe. 

  **4**   
Isi ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu gusa. Nzirat' umusaraba we, Yatangiyeho kera.

title: 138 Mwami Wanjye, Nyakira
markdown:
### 138 Mwami Wanjye, Nyakira   

  **1**   
 Mwami wanjye nyakira, Ndakwiyeguriy' ubu; Ngay' amaboko yanjye, Yakoresh' uk' ushaka.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Nyuhagiz' amaraso yawe ( nere rwose ); Maz' anyezehw' inenge yose ( nere rwose ); Ibyanjye byose ndabikweguriye, None n' iteka ryose.

  **2**   
Ngib' ibirenge byanjye, Byerekez' ah' ushaka. Ngir' ijwi ryanjye na ryo, Rijye riguhimbaza. 

  **3**   
Nguhay' akanwa kanjye; Mwami, kakuvugire. Ngub' ubutunzi bwanjye, Sinzagir' icyo nkwima. 

  **4**   
Nguhay' igihe cyanjye, Sinzakiguteraho; Nguhay' ubwenge bwanjye, Bukoresh' uk' ushaka. 

  **5**   
Ngiy' imigambi yanjye; Igengwe nawe, Mwami. Nguy' umutima wanjye, Ube uwawe rwose. 

  **6**   
Mwam' urukundo rwanjye, Ni wowe nzarukunda; Nkwihaye nimazeyo, None n' iteka ryose.

title: 139 Nabony' Inshut' Ihebuje
markdown:
### 139 Nabony' Inshut' Ihebuje   

  **1**   
 Nabony' inshut' ihebuje! Yankunze ntarabaho; Yanyiyegereshej' ineza, N' urukundo rw' iteka, Bituma dushyikirana, Ubudatandukana; Kuko nd' uwe nawe n' uwanjye, Ibihe bidashira.

  **2**   
Nabony' inshut' ihebuje! Yamberey' impongano. Urets' ibyo kump' ubugingo, Yaranyitangiriye. Ntacyo mfite nit' icyanjye, Kuko tubisangiye. Ndamwiyeguriye burundu; Ibihe bidashira. 

  **3**   
Nabony' inshut' ihebuje! Nyir' ubutware bwose! Nibw' indindish' uko bukeye; Izangeza mw' ijuru. Ibyiza byanshyizw' imbere, Binsubizamw' intege; Reka nkore, noye kwiganda, Ngez' ubw' izanduhura. 

  **4**   
Nabony' incut' ihebuje! Y' impuhwe n' urukundo. Niy' indind' ikanyunganira; Niy' indenger' iteka. Mbese n' iki cyadutanya, Ko dukundana rwose? N' iby' iyi si, cyangwa s' urupfu? Oya nzab' uw' iteka.

title: 140 Numvise Yesu Ambwira Ati
markdown:
### 140 Numvise Yesu Ambwira Ati   

  **1**   
 Numvise Yes' ambwir' ati: Ngwino nkuruhure. Zan' ibikurushya byose, Mbikwikorerere. Musanga, mez' uko nari ndi, ndushye, mfite n' ishavu; Amber' uburuhukiro, Maz' aranezeza.

  **2**   
Numvise Yes' ambwir' ati: Ndaguher' ubuntu, Amaz' azakubeshaho, Unyw' uram' iteka. Nuko nsanga Yesu maz' ampa ya mazi y' ubugingo, Nshir' inyota, Ndahembuka; Nzahorana nawe. 

  **3**   
Numvise Yes' ambwir' ati: Ni jye Mucyo w' isi. N' undeb' uramurikirwa, Ntuzarindagira. Maze muhanz' amaso koko, Mbon' ar' izuba ryanjye; Rizamvir' iminsi yose y' ubugingo bwanjye.

title: 141 Mwami Mb' Uwawe Maramaje
markdown:
### 141 Mwami Mb' Uwawe Maramaje   

  **1**   
 Mwami, mb' uwawe maramaje, Nyigisha, nyigisha. Nkor' iby' ukunda, Mwami wanjye; Komez' umfashe.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Mb' uwawe ( Mwami ) ; Mb' uwawe ( Mwami ) ; Niyo migambi yanjye ; Mb' uwawe ( Mwami ) ; Mb' uwawe ( Mwami ) ; Mb' uwawe Mwami, None.

  **2**   
Iby' iyi si byamarir' iki, Ntari kumwe nawe? Byose nzabihara kubwawe, Ntungishwe nawe. 

  **3**   
Ndets' umunezero w' iyi si, Ngwino twibanire; Nibyo bizajya binogera, Bimpumurize.

title: 142 Mbeg' Umuns' Urush' Indi Kwera
markdown:
### 142 Mbeg' Umuns' Urush' Indi Kwera   

  **1**   
 Mbeg' umuns' urush' indi kwera; Niwo wa karindwi! Ng' uratuma ndek' iby' isi, Nkibwir' iby' ijuru!

  **2**   
Mbeg' uyu munsi wa karindwi, Turuhukiramo, Ng' uradutera kuramya Data, Wo mw' ijuru! 

  **3**   
Ni mutyo turamy' Uhoraho, Watuzirikanye, Agaherakw' akaduha, Uyu munsi wera. 

  **4**   
Niw' utugobotor' ibyaha, Bikaducikaho, Kukw' atugirir' ubuntu, Buvuye mw' ijuru.

title: 143 Udusezeresh' Umugisha Wawe
markdown:
### 143 Udusezeresh' Umugisha Wawe   

  **1**   
 Udusezeresh' umugisha wawe; Mwam' utwuzuz' amahoro; Urukundo rwawe rudusabemo, Tubone kunesha rwose. Ngwin' uduhembure, Ngwin' uduhembure; Tukiri mur' iyi si y' igomero.

  **2**   
Tuguhay' ishimwe no kukuramya, Kubw' ubutumwa bw' imvaho, Bwagukomotseho bukadukiza, Bunyur' imitima yacu; Tubushikamemo, Tubushikamemo; Tugundir' ukuri, Tudacogora. 

  **3**   
Mbeshwaho n' imbabazi zawe nyinshi, None ndakwiyeguriye. Ngwin' uduhumurish' impuhwe zawe, Duhore turwan' ishyaka; Tuzager' i wawe, Tuzager' iwawe; Tukubone nta kidukingirije.

title: 144 Mukiza, Ndamaramaje
markdown:
### 144 Mukiza, Ndamaramaje   

  **1**   
 Mukiza, ndamaramaje, Ndatwaranira kugera, Ku rugero runkwiriye; Mwami mfasha ngo ndusheho.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Nzamura maze nger' aho wangeneye, Mwami wanjye; Ku rugero rusumbyeho; Mwami mfasha ngo ndusheho.

  **2**   
Ntabwo ngifit' umutima, Wo kuguma mu by' iyi si; N' ubwo bamwe babikunda, Ngambiriye kujya mbere. 

  **3**   
Ndashaka gusumb' iby' isi, Nubw' umwanz' anyibasiye; Kuko namaze kwizera, Yukw' Iman' izandengera. 

  **4**   
Ndashaka kumaranira, Kurabukw' ubwiza bwawe; Ariko nkomeze nsenge, Ngez' ubwo nzager' i wawe.

title: 145 Ntushak' Urwitwazo
markdown:
### 145 Ntushak' Urwitwazo   

  **1**   
 Ntushak' urwitwazo, Harihw' imirimo, Ahubw' itegure gukorer' Imana. Yakwinginze kenshi, Kand' ikurarika; Witinda kwemera, Bizakunezeza.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Itaba! ( none ); Ntushak' urwitwazo; Itaba! ( none ); Wigingimiranya. Ntushak' urwitwazo, Udasubizwa ngo: Hoshi wampinyuye; Nkuvukij' ubwami.

  **2**   
Ntushak' urwitwazo urahamagawe; Dor' aho wangiye, Noneho witabe. Imirim' ireze, Hagumy' abakozi; Ngwin' umukorere; Uzagororerwa. 

  **3**   
Ntushak' urwitwazo, Kuko nib' utinze, Bizagukoraho, Izakwivumbura. Imbabazi zayo, Ntabwo zirashira; Haguruka bwangu, Ubibabarirwe.

title: 146 Yesu Mwami W' Abami
markdown:
### 146 Yesu Mwami W' Abami   

  **1**   
 Yesu Mwami w' abami, Ngwin' ube muri jye! He kub' ari jy' uvuga, Ujy' umvugiramo. Unsabe mu mutima, Ngengwe nawe rwose, Maz' abajya bandeba, Bajye bakubona.

  **2**   
Ndakwiyeguriy' ubu, Ez' ibyaha byanjye; Ngaragareh' ubwiza bwawe buhebuje. Ngir' umutim' utuje, Ne guteraganwa; Niyoroshye nganduke, Ngo nkoreshwe nawe. 

  **3**   
Ingingo zanjye zose, Zijye zikumvira; Uzikoreshereze, Zikubahirize. Ne kujya nivovota, Ngo mpore ku nkeke. Y' ibimbaho, nishama, Nta mahoro mfite. 

  **4**   
Ni wowe ntegereje, Ungenz' uk' ushaka. Ubwanjye nditeguye, Simfit' ikinziga. Yesu Mwami w' abami, Ngwin' ube muri jye! Maz' ibyo nkora byose, Mbikoreshwe nawe.

title: 147 Data Mwiza, Nyigiza Hafi
markdown:
### 147 Data Mwiza, Nyigiza Hafi   

  **1**   
 Data mwiza, nyigiza hafi; Nkube mu gituza;Ni wowe buhungiro bwanjye, N' uburuhukiro.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
   S. na A : Data, nyigiza hafi, Ndifuza ko tubana; Data, ndifuza ko tubana.
    T. na B : Data, data, nyigiza hafi, Ndifuza cyane ko tubana; Data, nyigiza hafi; ndifuza ko tubana, Ndifuza ko tubana.

  **2**   
Data mwiza, nyigiza hafi; Nkomeza ntundeke; Nakwishimira ko tubana, Ne kuraragira. 

  **3**   
Data mwiza, nyigiza hafi; Ngez' ubwo nsa nawe; Mpembur' unyuhagir' unyeze, Mb' umuziranenge.

title: 148 Aho Njyanye Na Yesu
markdown:
### 148 Aho Njyanye Na Yesu   

  **1**   
 Aho njyanye na Yesu mb' amahoro, Ahw' anyobora hose mur' iyi si. Aho njya tutajyanye nta kinyura, Iyo njyanye na Yesu ntacyo ntinya.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Aho njyanye nawe, nta kintinyisha, Aho njyanye na Yesu mb' amahoro.

  **2**   
Aho njyanye na Yesu sinigunga, Nubw' izindi nshuti zampemukira; Nubw' anyobora mu nzir' iruhije, Aho njyanye na Yesu ndanezerwa. 

  **3**   
Njyanye na Yesu sinatiny' urupfu, N' iyo ngoswe n' umwijima w' icyago, Nzi ko nzakanguk' ubutazongera, Kujarajarira mur' iy' isi mbi.

title: 149 Nshuti Jy' ugendera Mu Mucyo
markdown:
### 149 Nshuti Jy' ugendera Mu Mucyo   

  **1**   
 Nshuti jy' ugendera mu mucyo, Woye kurindagira; Umwuka Wera wo mw' ijuru, Ajy' akuyobora.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
   S. na A :Gendera mu mucyo, Gendera mu mucyo; Gendera mu mucyo, Mu mucyo waka w' Imana.
    T. na B. :Gendera mu mucy' utangaje w' Imana; Gendera mu mucy' utangaje w' Imana; Gendera mu mucy' utangaje w' Imana; Mu mucyo waka w' Imana;

  **2**   
Gendera mu mucyo w' ukuri, Ko mw' Ijambo ry' Imana; Uzajy' ukuyobor' iteka, Ukwizez' Imana. 

  **3**   
Jy' ugendera mu mucy' iteka, Ujy' ukumurikira; Maz' utamurur' umwijima, Hose hatangaze. 

  **4**   
Gendera mu mucyo ng' umenye, Urukundo rw' Imana, N' uburyo yakunze ab' isi, Ikabarokora.

title: 150 Mbes' Abasaruzi Bari He?
markdown:
### 150 Mbes' Abasaruzi Bari He?   

  **1**   
 Mbes' abasaruzi bari hehe, Bo gusarur' abakiranutsi? Babangir' ukurink' imihoro, Kandi ntibab' ar' abanyabute.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Abasaruzi se bari he? Ngo bafatanye natwe gusarura, Maze twishime, Turi kumwe, Isarura nirirangira.

  **2**   
Mushakire mu mihana yose; Nubw' urwiri rwarenga ku ngano; Muzishake kuko zirurimo, Zose muzisarurir' Imana. 

  **3**   
Dor' imirima yereye rimwe, Kandi bose bitez' isarura; Arikw' abasaruzi ni bake, Umurimo wab' urabasaze. 

  **4**   
Mwa bantu mwe, Mwahur' imihoro! Musarur' igihe kirageze! Mushishikare Umwam' araje; Dor' abazaniy' ingororano!

title: 151 Ngamij' Iby' Igihugu Cy' Igikundiro
markdown:
### 151 Ngamij' Iby' Igihugu Cy' Igikundiro   

  **1**   
 Ngamij' iby' igihugu cy' igikundiro; Nzageray' izuba rirenze. Ariko s' ikamba Yes' azamperayo, Azaritakahw' inyenyeri?

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Mbes' ikamba ryanjye Yes' azamperayo, Azaritakahw' inyenyeri (inyenyeri)? Ningir' amahirwe, Nkabana na Yesu, Azaritakahw' inyenyeri (inyenyeri)?

  **2**   
Reka nkore, nsenge, mbiheshejwe nawe, Mugarurir' abazimiye. N'agaruka kuri wa munsi w' ubwiza, Nzatakwehw' inyenyeri nyinshi. 

  **3**   
Mbeg' umunezer' uhebuje nzagira, Nimwerek' abo nakijije, Mfite n' ibyishimo bitavugwa, Mbonye inyenyeri kw' ikamba ryanjye.

title: 152 Ngwino Yesu
markdown:
### 152 Ngwino Yesu   

  **1**   
 Ngwino Yes' uvugane, N' umutima wanjye: Maz' umpumuriz' uti: Ntabwo nagusize. Nyugurur' umutima, Nihutire kumva, Ijwi ryawe ry' impuhwe, Nyuzuz' ibyishimo.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Mbwiz' ijwi ryongorera, Mbwiran' urukundo; Ut' uzanesh' iteka, Ub' umudendezo. Vugana nanjy' iteka, Mbwir' ubudahwema, Reka numv' uk' umbwira ngo: Sinaguhanye.

  **2**   
Yobora abana bawe, Uvugane nabo; Ubuzuz' ibyishimo, Bige kugusenga. Mwami, Bitange rwose, Bakwiyegurire; Tebuts' ubwami bwawe, Twibanire nawe. 

  **3**   
Ngwin' uvugane natwe, Uduhishurire, Iby' imigambi yawe, N' inshingano yacu, Duhe kuguhimbaza, Tukubahirize, Tujye tunezererwa gukor' iby' ushaka.

title: 153 Mwami, Sinsabir' Iby' Ejo
markdown:
### 153 Mwami, Sinsabir' Iby' Ejo   

  **1**   
 Mwami, sinsabir' iby' ejo, Mfasha none, Ndind' urukongi rw' ibyaha, Uyu munsi. Ne gucumuz' ururimi, Mputiyeho; Mwami, rind' iminwa yanjye, Uyu munsi.

  **2**   
Njye nshunguz' ubury' umwete, No gusenga; Ngwe neza mu buryo bwose, Uyu munsi. Nkomeze nkor' iby' ushaka, Ngire bwangu; Mwami, nemere kwitanga, Uyu munsi. 

  **3**   
Urupfu niruntungura, Mbe ntunganye; Amasezerano yawe, Ndayiteze; Mwami, sinsabir' iby' ejo, Mfasha none; Ndind' unkomez' undagire, Uyu munsi; Amen.

title: 154 Murinzi We, Ngaho Mbwira
markdown:
### 154 Murinzi We, Ngaho Mbwira   

  **1**   
 Murinzi we, ngaho mbwira, Mbese bugiye gucya? Nta bimenyets' urabona, K' Umwami yegereje? Mugenzi we haguruka! Umusek' uratambitse; Tyo kenyera, maz' ukeshe, Haguruka; bwakeye!

  **2**   
Murinzi we, dor' umucyo, Ukomeje gukwira! Reba naw' ibimenyetso, Bitangaza kuza kwe. Ubw' impanda zizavuga, Abapfuye bazazuka. Ubutazongera gupfa, Bibanire n' Umwami. 

  **3**   
Murinzi we, vuz' impundu, Igihe kirageze! Mwese nimurangurure, Mubyamamaze hose. Mugenzi we, nawe reba; Ubwami bugeze hafi; Ngiriya Yerusalemu, Irarabagirana. 

  **4**   
Murinzi, mur' uwo murwa, W ' igikundiro rwose, Nih' Umwami w' i Sioni, Adutegerereje. Ubwami bwe buragutse, Buhetuy' iyi si yose; N' ubwami budahanguka; Hahirw' ababujyamo. 

  **5**   
Murinzi dor' igihugu, Cy' uburumbuke cyane, Gihora kimeze neza, Nka Edeni ya kera. Gira bwangu ntuzarire, Hasigay' igihe gito, Abacungujw' amaraso bakagerayo vuba.

title: 155 Aho Nzahamagarwa Hose
markdown:
### 155 Aho Nzahamagarwa Hose   

  **1**   
 Aho nzahamagarwa hose, Ari no mu misozi, Cyangwa ku rugamba rukaze, Mubyeyi, n' unkenera, Ukambwiz' ijwi ryawe ritoya, Ukannyuz' inzira ntazi, Nzakwishyira mu maboko, mvuge nti: Nzajy'ah'unshakira hose.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Nzajy' ah' unshakira hose, Mwami; Mu misozi no mu bibaya. Nzavug' iby' ushaka ko mvuga Mwami, Kandi nzaba nk' uk' ushaka.

  **2**   
Ahari Yes' ashaka yuko muvugir' uyu munsi; Ahari habonek' impabe, Nkwiriye guhabura; Murokozi wanjye, N' unyobora, N' ahar' ibihanamanga; Sinzareka kogez' inkuru yawe; Nzajy' ah' unshakira hose. 

  **3**   
Ntabwo nshidikanya, Har' aho Mwam' ushaka ko nkora, Mu kubaho kwanjye kugufi, Nkorer' Uwambambiwe. Mwami, Nkubikij' ibyanjye byose, Nzi k' unkunda bitangaje. Nzakor' iby' ushaka, mbikunze cyane; Nzajy' ah' unshakira hose.

title: 156 Amagambo Y' Umujinya
markdown:
### 156 Amagambo Y' Umujinya   

  **1**   
 Amagambo y' umujinya, Ntakabave mu kanwa! Ahubw' umutim' uyacuby' atararushy' asohoka.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**

    B. na T.: Mukundane, Mukundane; Ngir' itegeko ryanjye : Mukundane, Mukundane; n' itegeko rye.

  **2**

  **3**

title: 157 N' Igihe Cy' Isarura
markdown:
### 157 N' Igihe Cy' Isarura   

  **1**

  **GUSUBURIMO:**

  **2**

  **3**

markdown:
### 158 Isarura Ry' Isi Riregereje   

  **1**

  **GUSUBURIMO:**

    A.T.B. : Mugire bwangu mwese; Nimuze muhunik' imiba ye. Nimuze mugire bwangu mwese; Nimuze mwese nimuze.

  **3**

title: 159 Nyabun' Uburyo Ngukennye!
markdown:
### 159 Nyabun' Uburyo Ngukennye!

  **3**

  **4**

title: 160 Icyampa Nkab' Uwawe
markdown:
### 160 Icyampa Nkab' Uwawe

  **GUSUBURIMO:**

  **4**

title: 161 Mfit' Inshuti Y' Ukuri
markdown:
### 161 Mfit' Inshuti Y' Ukuri   

  **1**   
 Mfit' inshuti y' ukuri y' inkoramutima, Irankunda bihebuje, Nzi kw' itazampana. Ntabwo nayiv' iruhande, Nkunda ko tubana, Iyo nshuti ni Yesu, Umukiza.

  **2**   
Iyo nguy' agacuho, Ameny' uko meze; Ntanyirengagiza rwose: Aransindagiza, Akanyobora mu nzira, Yo gukiranuka; N' inshuti nkunda cyane, Yes' Umwami. 

  **3**

### 162 Umukiz' Aranyobora

title: 163 Yes' Arahamagar' Ati:
markdown:
### 163 Yes' Arahamagar' Ati:   

  **1**

  **2**

  **3**

  **4**

title: 167 Mwa Bera B' Umwami

title: 169 Wa Muragwa We!

### 169 Wa Muragwa We!

  **2**

  **3**

  **4**   
Nyamuneka, ntugir' imitim' ibiri; Ba mas' Umwam' atagutungura; Dor' umucy' utangiye gutangaza; Muragwa we, vuz' impundu, wishime!

title: 171 Murinzi We W' i Siyoni
markdown:
### 171 Murinzi We W' i Siyoni

title: 172 Ngabo, Muhaguruke!
markdown:
### 172 Ngabo, Muhaguruke!

  **3**   
Maz' abamarayika baza kumuhumuriza, Kuko yar' ababajwe n' imibabaro y' abantu. 

  **4**   
Tuzamureb' iteka abazaba bacunguwe, Duhore turirimba urukundo yadukunze.

title: 233 Amarembo Niyugururwa
markdown:
### 233 Amarembo Niyugururwa   

  **1**   
 Ntituzongera kuba mu mwijima, Amarembo niyugururwa. Ahubwo tuzaba muri rwa rurembo, Rumurikirwa n' Imana.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
   S. na A. : Amarembo niyugururwa, Amarembo niyugururwa. Mbeg' umunezero tuzahagirira, Amarembo yuguruwe!
    T. na B. : Amarembo niyu...ru... ...gururwa, Amarembo Niyu... ru... gururwa, Mbeg' umunezero tuzahagirira, Amarembo yuguruwe!

  **2**   
Inshuti zizandindira ku cyambu, Amarembo niyugururwa.  Nzajya kwiber' ahatazarangw' icyaha, Amarembo yuguruwe. 

  **3**   
Nta ndwara no kuribwa bizabayo, Amarembo niyugururwa. Tuziganirira n' abakunzi bacu, Amarembo yuguruwe. 

  **4**   
Nzagir' umunezer' utarondorwa, Amarembo niyugururwa. Nzahora nirebera Yesu mu maso, Amarembo yuguruwe. 

  **5**   
Tuzagendera mu mucyo w'Imana, Amarembo niyugururwa. Tuzaba turirimban' umunezero, Amarembo yuguruwe. 

  **6**   
Ntabwo nzongera kuvunwa n' ishavu, Amarembo niyugururwa. Nzabana n' Umwami Yes' iteka ryose Amarembo yuguruwe.

title: 234 Nind' Uzagera Mu Rurembo?
markdown:
### 234 Nind' Uzagera Mu Rurembo?   

  **1**   
 Nind' uzagera mu rurembo, Ruhorahw' ibihe byose, Akabon' ibyiza bihari, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe? Akahabon' inzira zose zisizemw' izahabu nziza, Agahora mu munezero, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe?

  **2**   
Nind' uzatur' umusaraba, Ngw' aruhuk' iteka ryose, Umwizer' azahabw' ikamba, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe? Azareb' Umwami mu maso, Akiz' imibabaro yose, Abane naw' iteka ryose, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe? 

  **3**   
Kandi har' uzakingiranwa, Ubutazakingurirwa, Azabwirwa ngo ntabwo nkuzi, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe? Azahamagarir' ubusa, Urugi ruzaba rwakinzwe, Bazagororerw' asigare, Mbese nijye cyangwa wowe? 

  **4**   
Harih' uzishimir' intsinzi, Anesheje, Anesheje, Ari hamwe n' abacunguwe, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe? Har' uzaramukanya n' abe, Batandukanijwe n' ibyago, Be kongera gutandukana, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe?

title: 235 Ngufitiy' Ubutumwa
markdown:
### 235 Ngufitiy' Ubutumwa   

  **1**   
 Ngufitiy' ubutumwa, Haleluya, N' ubutumwa bw' Umukiza, Bwanditse mw' Ijambo rye, Haleluya, Muhugukire urakizwa.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Tyo reba ( tyo reba) maz' ukire ( maz' ukire ), Reba Yes' Urakizwa. Byanditswe mw' Ijambo rye, Haleluya Muhugukire urakizwa.

  **2**   
Ngufitiy' ubutumwa bw' urukundo, Mwene Data, Haleluya, Buturutse mw' ijuru, Haleluya, Bwatanzwe n' Umukiza Yesu. 

  **3**   
Weguriw' ubugingo, Haleluya, Buhorahw' iteka ryose, N' uhanga Yes' amaso, Haleluya, Niwe wenyine ugukiza.

title: 236 Ndi Mu Murima
markdown:
### 236 Ndi Mu Murima   

  **1**   
 Ndi mu murima jyenyine, Ikime gitonze ku byatsi, Numv' ijwi rivuga riti: Umwana w' Iman' aratungutse.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Turakomeza turagendana, Maz' ambwira ko yantoye, Mbeg' ibyishimo twari dufite, Bitigeze bibaho!

  **2**   
Aravuga maz' ijwi rye ryiza ryikirizwa n' inyoni, Indirimbo nziza namwumvanye ntabw' izamva ku mutima. 

  **3**   
Tugumana mu murima, Kuk' ubwire bwari bukubye, Maze anyoherez' ankangara, Arikw' ar' ukumpwitura.

title: 237 Ntabwo Ndamenya
markdown:
### 237 Ntabwo Ndamenya   

  **1**   
 Ntabwo ndamenya nez' icyatumye Iman' ingirir 'ubuntu, Bigatum' ingir' uwo mu muryango w' abana bayikunda!

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Kuko nzi nez' uwo nizeye, Kand' ariwe ushobora byose, Niwe undindir' ubugingo, Kugeza urya munsi.

  **2**   
Ntabwo nzi nez' uburyo yampaye, Uko kwizera gukiza, N'ubury' Ijambo rye ryampaye amahoro yo mu mutima! 

  **3**   
Sinzi ubury' Umwuka yihanisha abanyabyaha nkanjye, Kumenyesh' abandi ibya Yesu, Bidutera kumwizera. 

  **4**   
Ntabwo nz' icyo nateganirijwe, Ar' icyiza cyangw' ikibi, Imibabaro n' iminsi myiza, Byose bir' imbere yawe. 

  **5**   
Sinzi igih' Umwam' azazira, Ndetse n' ahw' azaturuka, Niba mbana na Yesu mur' iki gihe, Nzamusanganira.

title: 238 Nguhay' Umwanya
markdown:
### 238 Nguhay' Umwanya
 **1**   
 Wavuye mw' ijuru usig' ubwami bwawe, Uza mur' iyi si ku bwanjye, I Betelehemu, Ntiwabonay' icumbi, Kand' ur' Umwami w' abami.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Nguhay' umwanya mu mutima, Uwiberemw' ibihe byose, Ndawukweguriye Mwami wanjye, Uwiberemw' ibihe byose.

  **2**   
Abamarayika bakuririmbiraga, Bogez' icyubahiro cyawe, Maz' ugeze mw' isi uvuk' ur' umukene, Wicisha bugufi cyane. 

  **3**   
Ingunzu zitahiraga mu myobo yazo, Inyoni zirara mu byari, Ariko woweho wararaga butunda, Mw' ishyamba ry' i Galilaya. 

  **4**   
Wazaniy' abantu Ijambo rihoraho, Ngo rizabah' umudendezo, Maze barakwanga bakujyan' i Kalvari, Bakwambikiray' amahwa. 

  **5**   
Ubw' uzagaruka mw' ikobe ry' indirimbo, Uje mu cyubahiro cyawe, Ndifuza cyane yuko wazampamagara, Ut' icar' iburyo bwanjye.

title: 239 Twabony' Agakiza
markdown:
### 239 Twabony' Agakiza   

  **1**   
 Twabony' agakiza, Muri Yesu Kristo, Yadupfiriye i Kalvari, Mu rukundo rwe rutagir' iherezo, Twatsindishirijwe na Yesu

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Yesu yabay' incungu y' ibyaha byacu, Yaducunguj' amaraso ye,
  Nzahora ndirimb' urukundo rwinshi, Yesu yankunze kera.

  **2**   
Igitambo cy' amaraso y' Umukiza, Nicyo cyadukijij' ibyaha, Cyadukuyehw' inenge twari dufite, Ubu tur' abana b' Imana. 

  **3**   
Urukund' Imana yakunze umuntu, N' ukuri ruhebuje byose, Nta yindi mpano dufite twakwitura, Tuguhay' imitima yacu.

title: 240 Uko Ndushaho kumukorera
markdown:
### 240 Uko Ndushaho kumukorera   

  **1**   
 Aho menyey' Umukiza, Nkanagengwa nawe, Uko ndushaho kumukorera, Nikw' arushaho kunyuzuramo.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Uko njya ndushaho kumukorera, Nawe, nikw' arushaho kunyuzura, Kandi uko ndushaho kumukunda, Nawe nikw' arushaho kunyuzuramo.

  **2**   
Angirir' ubuntu bwinshi, Nkamererwa neza, Uko ndushaho kumuyoboka, Nikw' arushaho kunyuzuramo.

title: 241 Nabonye Kuza Kwa Yesu
markdown:
### 241 Nabonye Kuza Kwa Yesu   

  **1**   
 Nabonye kuza kwa Yesu afit' icyubahiro, Amaze gusenya rwos' ububiko bw' umujinya, Yadukijije n' ubugi bw' inkot' ityaye cyane, Niw' utuyobora.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Nasingizwe, Haleluya, Nasingizwe, Haleluya, Nasingizwe, Haleluya, Niw' utuyobora.

  **2**   
Namubonye no mu mazu y' abantu benshi cyane, Bamwubakiramw' ibicaniro nimugoroba, Nongera kumubon' ac' imanza zitarenganya, Niw' utuyobora. 

  **3**   
Akomeje guhamagaz' abant' ijwi ry' impanda, Arateguriz' abantu bose gucirw' imanza. Mutima wanjye mwitabe vuba unezerewe, Niw' utuyobora.

title: 242 Mbeg' Umunsi Mwiza !
markdown:
### 242 Mbeg' Umunsi Mwiza !   

  **1**   
 Mbeg' umunsi mwiz' ubw' abacunguwe bazaba bar' imbere ye. Bazaririmb' indirimbo kubw' ikuzo n' ubuntu bwayo.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Inteko zingana n' umusenyi, Zingana n' umusenyi mwinshi, Abacunguwe bazangana n' umusenyi, Umusenyi bangana n' umusenyi.

  **2**   
Ndareb' ingabo zitabarika zerekan' umucyo w' ijuru, Zifit' amahoro atangaje ku maremb' arabagirana. 

  **3**   
Numv' ijwi ryiza ry' Umucunguzi riva ku ntebe ye y' ubwami, Nimuz' abahiriwe na Data. Mwambikw' ikamba ryo kunesha. 

  **4**   
Abera bazaririmba n' abamarayika batabarika, Isi izahind' umushyitsi kand' ibyago bizaba bishize.

title: 243 Nimutyo Turirimban' Umunezero
markdown:
### 243 Nimutyo Turirimban' Umunezero   

  **1**   
 Nimutyo turirimban' umunezero, Twegereje kuger' iwacu, Aho niho tuzaban' iteka ryose, Ubu tugiye kugerayo.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
   S. na T. : Mu gihe gito, Mu gihe gito, Tuzaba tugezeyo, Tugiye kuban' ubudatandukana, Ubu tugiye kugerayo.
    A. na B. : Mu gihe gito, Mu gihe gito, Tuzaba tugezeyo, Tugiye kuban' ubudatandukana, Ubu tugiye kugerayo.

  **2**   
Mutyo dushishikare dukore neza, Twegereje kuger' iwacu, Kand' Imana yiteguye kutwakira. Ubu tugiye kugerayo. 

  **3**   
Dukomez' urugendo twe gucogora, Twegereje kuger' iwacu, Nimutyo twamamaz' iyo nkuru nziza, Ubu tugiye kugerayo. 

  **4**   
Mbeg' umunezero tuzagirirayo! Twegereje kuger' iwacu, Ntituzongera kubogoz' amarira, Ubu tugiye kugerayo.

title: 244 Muze Dusingiz' Umwami
markdown:
### 244 Muze Dusingiz' Umwami   

  **1**   
 Muze dusingiz' Umwami, Abera muz' imbere ye, Abahora mumuramya, Mwamamaz' ububasha bwe.

  **2**   
Mumusingiriz' ahera, Muririmbe mwisanzuye,Nimumuramye mwunamye, Mumwubahe kukw' abumva. 

  **3**   
Murahoran' ubuntu bwe butemba buv' i Siyoni, N' Umuremyi, N' Uhoraho, Bose nibamusingize.

title: 245 Ahw' Umukiza Anyobora
markdown:
### 245 Ahw' Umukiza Anyobora   

  **1**   
 Ahw' Umukiza anyobora, Nzemera mukurikire, Nzamukurikir' iteka, Sinzakorwa n' isoni.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Ahw' Umukiza anyobora, Nzemera mukurikire, Ahw' azanyobora hose, Nzajya mukurikira.

  **2**   
N' ubwo haba mu mwijima, Nkagenda nyobagurika, Nzumv' ijwi ry' uwo Mukiza rinsubizemw' intege. 

  **3**   
N' ubw' isi yambushabusha, Nkabur' epfo na ruguru, Mukiza uzandamira, Ntabwo nzarambarara. 

  **4**   
Ibi byago nibishira, Azanyijyanir' iwacu, Ntihabay' umubabaro, Nzaba ntanye n' ibyaha.

title: 246 Twumvire Mwami
markdown:
### 246 Twumvire Mwami
  Twumvire Mwami, Turakuramya, Uduteg' amatwi, Duh' amahoro. Amen.

title: 247 Nzinutsw' Ibyo Mw Isi
markdown:
### 247 Nzinutsw' Ibyo Mw Isi   

  **1**   
 Nzinutsw' ibyo mw' isi, Mpisemo Yesu! Sinzifatanya nabyo, Mpisemo Yesu! N' isi y' umwijima, Nta buruhukiro, Yesu niwe mugisha, Mpisemo Yesu!

  **2**   
Wa si we, winshuka, Mpisemo Yesu! Nzabana naw' iteka, Namuhisemo, Ibyo mw' isi byose, n' iby' igihe gito, Bimeneka nk' ibumba, Mpisemo Yesu! 

  **3**   
Iby' isi n' inzozi, Mpisemo Yesu! Niwe umber' umucyo, Mpisemo Yesu! Nashatse kwikiza, Binsubiz' inyuma, Yesu niwe wanyuze, Niwe mpisemo! 

  **4**   
Ntabwo ntiny' urupfu, Mpisemo Yesu! Nshaka kubahw' iteka, Mpisemo Yesu! Ndashaka kugera, Aho nzab' iteka, Nzaba mu gituza cye, Mpisemo Yesu.

title: 248 Mutima Wanjye Ucururuke
markdown:
### 248 Mutima Wanjye Ucururuke   

  **1**   
 Mutima wanjye ucururuke, Nugir' ibiguter' impagarara,  Wiringire Ishobora byose, N' imigambi yayo myiza.

  **2**   
Mutima wanjy' iby' ari byo byose, N' ubw' ibihe byagenda bihinduka, Imbabazi, zayo ntizishira, Zihorahw' ibihe byose. 

  **3**   
Mutima wanjye uremerewe, N' ubwo wab' utew' ubwoba n' urupfu, Ni wiheba wisung' Uwiteka, Agukingurir' ijuru. 

  **4**   
Mutima wanjy' uhereye kera, Ntiwigeze ubur' umudendezo, Isung' Imana izakwakira, Wemere kugengwa na yo. 

  **5**   
Ubugingo bwiza buboneye, Bushishikarira gukor' ibyiza, Mukiza mfasha ngo mbugereho, Ump' umutim' utunganye.

title: 249 Ikuzo Ni Iryawe !
markdown:
### 249 Ikuzo Ni Iryawe !   

  **1**   
 Ikuzo n' iryawe Data wa Twese, Nari nahabiye kure yawe, Wangejeje mu mucyo w' itangaza, Umvana mu bubata ndakira.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Mbeg' urukundo ruhebuje!Nababariwe, N' inkuru nziza kuri twe.

  **2**   
Mbeg' urukundo rutarondoreka! Rwatumye Yesu azakunshaka. Nar' umuhanya sinari nkwiriye, Gukira ngukesha Yesu gusa. 

  **3**   
Akir' uyu mutima wanjye Mwami, Nkweguriy' imibereho yanjye, Wowe wanyitangiye ukankiza, Wanyejeshej' amaraso yawe. 

  **4**   
Mana yanjye nkingira ndakwinginze, Sinashobora kwirwanirira, Kugira ngo nzanezererw' iteka, Twishimye, Dusingiza Umwami.

title: 250 Umukiza Niw' Unyobora
markdown:
### 250 Umukiza Niw' Unyobora   

  **1**   
 Umukiza niw' unyobor' iyo ndi mu bishuko, N' iy' amakub' angose, Amber' ubuhungiro, Niw' unkingir' ibishuko, Yesu nyiyoborere.

  **2**   
Uhosh' umuraba nk' umubyey' uhoz' umwana we, Ndets' uranawutegek' ubwaw' ukakumvira, Mwami wanjye Yesu nkunda, Ujy' Unyiyoborera. 

  **3**   
Iyo negerey' inkengero ngashy' ubwoba, Nkakwihishamo, Ndaruhuka, Nkumv' umpumuriz' uti: Witinya ntacy' uteze kuba, Nzajya nkuyobora.

title: 251 Yesu Araduhamagara !
markdown:
### 251 Yesu Araduhamagara !   

  **1**   
 Yes' araduhamagara, Ashaka kudukiza, Atubwiz' ijwi rye ati: Mukristo nkurikira.

  **2**   
Yes' araduhamagara, Ngo tuve mu by' iyi si, Araduhamagar' ati: Mukristo nkunda cyane. 

  **3**   
Iyo tumerewe neza, Cyangwa se tubabaye, Araduhamagar' ati: Mukristo nkunda rwose. 

  **4**   
Yes' araduhamagara, Mwami turakwitabye, Duhe kukumvira, Tugukunde kuruta byose.

title: 252 Nimucane Amatabaza
markdown:
### 252 Nimucane Amatabaza   

  **1**   
 Nimucan' amatabaza, Umwijim' ubay' icyago, Hazab' umwijim' ukaze, Umwam' ataragaruka.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Mubonez' amatabaza, Kandi nimwubah' Imana, Kuza kw' Umwami kuri hafi, Mubonez' amatabaza.

  **2**   
Abant' ibihumbi byinshi, Bahinyur' ubu butumwa, Natwe tubushikamyemo, Dutegerez' Umukiza. 

  **3**   
Ijambo rye n' itabaza, Ntituzigera tuyoba, N' ubw' amakub' ari hose, Ntabw' Iman' izaduhana. 

  **4**   
Dukor' imirimo myiza, Twe guh' ab' iy' is' urwaho, Tuzabiherw' imigisha, Nidukomeza kwizera.

title: 253 Ujyuvug' Ibya Yesu
markdown:
### 253 Ujyuvug' Ibya Yesu   

  **1**   
 Ujy' uvug' ibya Yesu, Inshuti y' ukuri, Ngwin' uduhumurish' ibyo yagukoreye.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Vuga Yesu gusa, Bizakuyobor' iteka, Jy' ubivug' uririmba, Kandi unasenga.

  **2**   
Ujy' uvug' ibya Yes' uzumv' ubabariwe, No kubw' ubuntu bwe tuzagera mw' ijuru. 

  **3**   
Sinabura kuvug' iby' umusaraba we, Nkund' uwo Mukiza, Kuko yanyitangiye. 

  **4**   
Uvug' ibya Yesu, Ntupfush' igih' ubusa, Kutita ku nshingano, Bitesh' agaciro. 

  **5**   
Ujy' uvug' ibya Yesu, N' ubwo wacogora, Va mu ntege nke zawe, Umwiyegurire.

title: 254 Ushimirw' Ibyiza Byose
markdown:
### 254 Ushimirw' Ibyiza Byose   

  **1**   
 Ushimirwe ibyiza byose, Siyoni murwa w' Imana, Itavuguruzwa yakugiz' ubuturo bwayo bwite, Wubatswe ku Rutare rw' iteka, N' iki cyaguhangara? Ugoteshejw' inkike z' agakiza, Reka gutiny' abanzi bawe.

  **2**   
Dore amazi y' ubugingo, Atemb' ava mu rukundo, Niy' abeshahw' abana bawe, Imibabar' igashira. Ninde se wacogora, Har' uwo mugez' umar' inyota? Ubuntu bw' uwo Mutanga-bugingo, Ntabwo buzagir' iherezo. 

  **3**   
Ahazenguruts' uwo murwa, Har' ibicu n' umuriro, Byerekana ko kugaruka kw' Umwami kuri bugufi, Hahirw' abazatur' i Siyoni, Bejeshejw' amaraso, Biyeguriye Yes' abahindur' abami, N' abatambyi b' Imana. 

  **4**   
Ndi mu muryango w'i Siyoni, Kubw' ubuntu bwawe Mwami, N' ubwo bampindur' urw' amenyo, Nzasingiz' izina ryawe, Ibinezeza byo mur' iyi si, Bihita nk' umuyaga, Umunezero uhoraho, Wateguriw' abana b' i Siyoni.

title: 255 Mbes' Aho Tuzahurira Ku Cyambu?
markdown:
### 255 Mbes' Aho Tuzahurira Ku Cyambu?   

  **1**   
 Mbes' aho tuzahurira ku cyambu cya rwa ruzi, Ahahor' umucy' iteka, Ntihab' umubabaro?

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Mbes' aho tuzahurira ku cyambu cya rwa ruzi? Tuzabonanirayo tuhanezererw' iteka?

  **2**   
Tuzahurira ku cyamb' urugendo rurangiye? Mbes' aho tuzahurirayo, Maze twiruhutse? 

  **3**   
Mbes' aho twese tuzahurira mu mudugudu, Wubatswe n' Uhoraho, Urimbishijwe yasipi? 

  **4**   
Abacunguwe bose, Bazaririmb' indirimbo, Kand' ibiremwa byose bizasingiz' Uhoraho. 

  **5**   
Mbes' aho tuzabonana n' abo twakundanaga, Maze twumv' amajwi yabo tubareba mu maso? 

  **6**   
Mbese tuzabonana na Krist' Umukiza wacu, Aje kujyan' intore ze mu bwami buhoraho?

title: 256 Abatuye Mw' Isi Mwese
markdown:
### 255 Mbes' Aho Tuzahurira Ku Cyambu?   

  **1**   
 Abatuye mw' isi mwese, Muririmbir' Uhoraho, Mumukorere mwishima, Mwogez' icyubahiro cye.

  **2**   
Mumenye kw' ari we Mana, Kukw' ariwe waturemye, Twese tur' umukumbi we, Turagiwe n' Uhoraho. 

  **3**   
Muze mwese mu rugo rwe, Muze mwese mumushima, Muhanik' amajwi yanyu, Kukw aribyo bikwiriye. 

  **4**   
Mwabaza muti: ni kuki? Nuk' Uhoraho ari mwiza, N' impuhwe ze zikaramba, Nta n' ubwo zizashiraho.

title: 257 Yesu Mucunguzi Wanjye
markdown:
### 257 Yesu Mucunguzi Wanjye   

  **1**   
 Yesu Mucunguzi wanjye, Niwe byishimo byanjye, Ni wowe ujy' ungoboka, Mu bihe by' amakuba.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Yesu Mucunguzi wanjye, Niwe ndirimbo yanjye, Nta yindi nshuti nabona, Nagereranya nawe.

  **2**   
Wagumye kumpumuriza, Mu bihe bibi byose, Ubwo nari nshumbirijwe, Ngoswe n' imibabaro. 

  **3**   
Ur' ibyiringiro byanjye, Ndayob' ukanyobora, Ni wowe nshuti y' ukuri, Undutir' abo mw' isi. 

  **4**   
Ni wow' undem' umutima, Mur' iyi si y' ibyaha, Nzakomeza ngusingize, Ngez' ubwo nzaz' iwawe.

title: 258 Yasezeranye Kuduh' Imvura
markdown:
### 258 Yasezeranye Kuduh' Imvura   

  **1**   
 Yasezeranye kuduha, Imvura y' umugisha, Iri sezerano ryayo, Ryaturutse mw' ijuru.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Duh' umugisha, Turifuz' umugisha, Uvuy' iwawe mw' ijuru, Nyabuneka wuduhe.

  **2**   
Yasezeranye kuduha, Imvura y' umugisha, Yitugoborer' uyu muns' ikwir' impanda zose. 

  **3**   
Yasezeranye kuduha, Imvura y' umugisha, Turayifuz' uy' umunsi, Sohoz' ibyo wavuze. 

  **4**   
Yasezeranye kuduha, Imvura y' umugisha, Icyayiduh' uyu munsi, Mana tubabarire.

title: 259 Inkomangiro Yawe Yafata ?
markdown:
### 259 Inkomangiro Yawe Yafata ?

Ese ntiwumva mu mutima, Wuzuwe n' Umwuka Wera? Ntiwifuza kumurikirwa na Yesu agukomeze. 

  **4**   
Kuber' iki wanga kwitaba? Urupfu rugusatira! Ngwino Yes' akumurikire, Ngwin' aragutegereje

title: 338 Ku Rutare Har' Isoko
markdown:
### 338 Ku Rutare Har' Isoko   

  **1**   
 Ku Rutare har' isoko itemb' imar' inyota, Mugenzi ngwino kw' isoko maz' unywe ushir' inyota.
  Gububiramo: Yesu niwe Gitare, Yaradupfiriye twese, Mugenzi ngwino kw' isoko, Maz' unywe ushir' inyota.

  **2**   
Arahamagar' ati: Ngwino kw' isoko y' ubuntu, Mugenz' ufit' inyota, Mbese ntiwakwitaba Yesu? 

  **3**   
Munyabyaha ngwino Yesu akwambuts' ubutayu, Umukiz' aragutegereje, Ngwino umusange.

title: 339 Ineza N' Imbabazi
markdown:
### 339 Ineza N' Imbabazi   

  **1**   
 Igihe nari nd' inzererezi, Ngenda mu mwijima w' ibyaha, Nih' Umwungeri yantaruye, None ndi mu nzir' ijy' iwacu.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Ineza n' imbabazi ze nibyo bizanyomaho, Iminsi yo kubaho kwanjy' ibihe byose, Ineza n' imbabazi ze nibyo bizanyomaho, Iminsi yose nzaba ndiho. Kandi nzaba mu nzu y' Uwiteka iteka, Nzarira ku meza yanteguriye kera, Ineza n' imbabazi ze nibyo bizanyomaho, Iminsi yose nzaba ndiho. ‘'Iminsi yose nzaba ndiho''.(Ku gice cya 3).

  **2**   
Ansubiz' intege mu bugingo, Anyonger' imbarag' iteka, Anjyan' ahar' amaz' atuje, Arind' intambwe zanjye zose. 

  **3**   
Mu gikombe cy' umwijim' ukaze, Umukiz' azabana nanjye, Azanyoboz' ukuboko kwe, Angez' aho yanteguriye.

title: 340 Yesu Ndagutakambiye
markdown:
### 340 Yesu Ndagutakambiye   

  **1**   
 Yesu ndagutakambiye, Kuk' utantabaye napfa, Ungeze ku gakiza kawe, Unyakir' uko ndi.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Unyakir' uko ndi, Unyakir' uko ndi, Mwami wanjye warampfiriye, Unyakir' uko ndi.

  **2**   
Ntabwo ngira kivurira, Arikw' amaraso yawe, Niyo yangize uk' ushaka, Unyakir' uko ndi. 

  **3**   
Sinabasha kwitegura, Nguhay' imigambi yanjye, Unkize kubw' izina ryawe, Unyakir' uko ndi. 

  **4**   
Dore Mwami nje ku birenge byaw' ungir' uk' ushaka, Utungany' umurimo wawe, Unyakir' uko ndi.

title: 341 Yesu Niw' Ujy' Unyobora
markdown:
### 341 Yesu Niw' Ujy' Unyobora   

  **1**   
 Yesu niw' ujy' unyobora, Amurikir' inzira, Mu ntege nke zanjye zose, Yesu niw' unyobora.
    Gububiramo: Amurikir' inzira, Amurikir' inzira. Mu ntege zanjye zose, Yesu niw' unyobora.

  **2**   
Yesu niw' ujy' undengera, Yamviriy' amaraso, Kwizera igitambo cye, Byatumye mbabarirwa.
    Gububiramo: Yamviriy' amaraso, Yamviriy' amaraso. Kwizera igitambo cye, Byatumye mbabarirwa. 

  **3**   
Anyezahw' inenge zose, Igihe munambyeho, Amp' ubugingo bw' iteka, Ntadukana n' urupfu,
    Gusubiramo: Igihe munambyeho, Igihe munambyeho, Amp' ubugingo bw' iteka, Ntandukana n' urupfu. 

  **4**   
Yanyishyuriy' umwenda, Ufit' igiciro cyinshi, Yanteguriye umwanya, Nzabana naw' iteka,
    Gububiramo: Yesu warancunguye, Yesu warancunguye. Yanteguriye umwanya, Nzabana naw' iteka,

title: 342 Mukiza Wanjye Nyobora
markdown:
### 342 Mukiza Wanjye Nyobora   

  **1**   
 Mukiza wanjye, Nyobor' ah' ushaka, Mfat' ikiganza maze nkumve bugufi, N' ubw' amahwa yampanda, Ngukurikire, Nyobor' ah' ushaka, Mukiza wanjye.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
   S : Nzagukurikira hose, Mukiza wanjye, Ngukurikire, Nzagukurikira Mukiza unyobore.
    A.,T. na B. : Nzagukuriki… ,…gukurikira hose, Mukiza wanjye, Ngukurikire, Nzagukuriki…,…rikira unyobore, …za unyobore , nyobora.

  **2**   
Mukiza wanjye, Nyobor' ah' ushaka, Ukomez' undinde unampumurize, N' ubw' umwijima wab' umbudits' imbere, Ntabwo nzatiny' unyoboye Mukiza. 

  **3**   
Njyan' ah' ushaka Mwam' icyo ngusaba, Nyuza mu nzira ntoya ne guteshuka, Nubwo Satan' anyoshya anyongorera, Mfasha njye nsubiza bwangu mpakana.

title: 343 Shimwa Ntama Y' Imana
markdown:
### 343 Shimwa Ntama Y' Imana   

  **1**   
 Shimwa Ntama y' Imana, Turagushima Ntama, Shimwa Ntama y' Imana, Turagushima cyane.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
Shimwa haleluya, Shimwa haleluya, Singizwa Mukiza, Wowe Ntama y' Imana.

  **2**   
Ubwami bwawe buze, Dutsindire icyaha, Waradukunze cyane, Shimwa Ntama y' Imana. 

  **3**   
Tukunambeho Mwami, Tujye tuguh' ikuzo, Turi kumwe n' Umwami, Ku musozi Siyoni.

title: 344 Nzahimbaza Imana
markdown:
### 344 Nzahimbaza Imana   

  **1**   
 Nzahimbaz' Imana mfite umutima unyuzwe, Kubw' urukundo rwawe n' imbabazi wangiriye, Mfasha mu ntege nke zanjye, Unsindire icyaha. Murikir' umutima wanjye, Nguhimbaze Mwami.

  **2**   
Mutima wanjye umvira, Wubahe Uwiteka, Ungarure hafi yawe, Ne kuyoba Mukiza, Narazimiye, Mvana mu nzira y' urupfu Mwami. Wampaye ibyiringiro igihe wapfiraga. 

  **3**   
Mfukamye imbere yawe, Ngushima Mwami wanjye, Ndakwinginze Mwami mpa umugisha uyu munsi, Nkeney' urukundo n' ubuntu biva kuri wowe. Maz' imibereho yanjye ijy' iguhesh' ikuzo.

title: 345 Yesu Araguhamagara!
markdown:
### 344 Nzahimbaza Imana   

  **1**   
 Yes' arahamagara, Munyabyaha ngwino, Ubu turagusabira, Nyamuna ngwino, Arakwiteze munyabyaha, Ngwino, Ngwino, N' igihe cyo kumumenya, Nyamuna ngwino.

  **2**   
Nib' uremerewe n' ibyaha, Ngwino, Ngwino, Yesu aragutur' uwo mutwaro ngwino, Yesu n' umunyebambe, Munyabyaha ngwino, Niwe wagucunguye, Munyabyaha ngwino. 

  **3**   
Umv' ubury' akwinginga, Munyabyaha ngwino, Ngwin' araguh' umugisha, Nyamuna ngwino, Araguhamagara, Munyabyaha ngwino, Ubu turagusabira, Nyamuna ngwino.

title: 346 Ndi Mu Maboko Akiza
markdown:
### 346 Ndi Mu Maboko Akiza   

  **1**   
 Iy' Umukiza wanjy' anyoboye, Uko ndi kose ngir' amahoro, Ankirish' umuraba w' ibyaha, Amaboko y' akiza.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
    S. na A. : Ndi mu mabokw' akiza, Amaboko y' akiza, N' ubwo naba ngeze no mu kaga, Ndi mu mabokw' akiza.
    T. na B. : Ndi mu mabo... ...kw' aki...mabokw' akiza, Amaboko akiza ....mabokw' akiza, N' ubwo naba ngeze no mu kaga, Ndi mu mabokw' akiza.

  **2**   
Ahor' andamiz' amaboko ye, Akanambwiz' ijwi ry' ihumure, Ati: Humura, Nzakuramiza, Amaboko akiza. 

  **3**   
Azandinda anyobor' iteka, Ntacyo nzatinya ndi kumwe nawe, Nzi kw' ahor' andind' iteka ryose, Ndi mu mabokw' akiza.

title: 347 Manyur' Umutsima
markdown:
### 347 Manyur' Umutsima   

  **1**   
 Manyur' umutsima w' ubugingo, Nk' uko wabigize mu kibaya, Natw' uduhaz' Ibyanditswe Byera, Turakwifuza Jambo rizima.

  **2**   
Mwami hir' ukuri menyeshejwe, Nk' uko wahiriye wa mutsima, Uri ku nyanja y' i Galilaya, Mbeshweho naw' Ushobora byose. 

  **3**   
Mwam' ur' umutsima w' ubugingo, Ijambo ryawe rimbeshejeho, Mpa guhazwa naryo tuzabane, Mpa kugukunda nzabane nawe. 

  **4**   
Amagamb' uvuga n' ubugingo, Mfasha ngo nyumvire, jye nta ntege, Ni wowe nkesh' ubugingo bwanjye, Ijambo ryawe rimpa gutsinda.

title: 348 Nakurikiye Yesu
markdown:
### 348 Nakurikiye Yesu   

  **1**   
 Nakurikiye Yesu mu kibaya akiz' abarwayi, Ac' iminyururu y' ibyaha no kuruhur' imitwaro.

  **GUSUBURIMO:**   
   S. Mbega ngo biranezeza gukurikira Yesu, Akanyoboz' ubuntu bwe akangeza mw' ijuru.    A., T., B.: Mbega ngo biranezeza, …rikira, …ra Yesu, … .Akanyoboz' ubuntu bwe, …kangeza; Mw' ijuru.

  **2**   
Namukurikiye ku musoz' igihe yahindurwaga, Imana iravuga iti: Ur' Umwana wanjye nkunda. 

  **3**   
Namukurikiy' i Kalvari, Agend' atukwa na benshi, Akomez' inzira y' Umwanzi, Yikorey' umusaraba. 

  **4**   
Nzamukurikira nkiriho, Maz' atume mpora nesha, Kugez' ubwo nzager' iwacu ahahor' umunezero.

title: 349 Nabony' Umuntu Unaniwe
markdown:
### 349 Nabony' Umuntu Unaniwe   

  **1**   
 Nabony' umunt' unaniwe, Kand' agenda yihanganye, Yikorey' umusaraba, Nyamara ntabwo yari yihebye, Imibabar' iba myinshi! Arik' uw' urahebuje! Mubaz' ikimuh' intege, Ati: Nuko mfit' ibyiringiro.

  **2**   
Nabony' afite n' intwaro, Arwany' iby' is' ashikamye, Kand' arwan' amaramaje ngw' azabon' ikamba rihoraho, N' ubwo yari yarenganye, Ntiyigeze yivovota, Mubaz' ikimuh' intege, Ati: Nuko mfit' ibyiringiro. 

  **3**   
Nabony' uwasiz' inshuti ze, Bakundanaga cyane, Atandukana n' iby' isi, Ahitamw' inzir' imuruhije, N' ubw' irimw' ibibabaza, Arikw' ariyumanganya, Mubaz' ikimuh' intege, Ati: Nuko mfit' ibyiringiro. 

  **4**   
Tur' abagenzi mur' iyi si, Y' akaga n' agahinda, Irimw' ibyago n' urwango, N' ibituro byuzuye mw' abantu, Kugez' ubwo Krist' azaza, Akarokor' abe bose, Se, n' iki cyadukomeza, Atar' ibyiringiro bishyitse?

title: 350 Mugenzi Komera
markdown:
### 350 Mugenzi Komera   

  **1**   
 Mugenzi komera Yes' ari hafi, Twamutegereje kera, Tugiye kwitahir' iwacu heza, Turirimbe ko dutsinze, Twihangane twe kumuhemukaho, Kandi w' ataduhemukiye, Yatwerets' urukundo ruhebuje, Nirwo rwatumy' adupfira.

  **2**   
Mugenzi komera, Utegerez' umudugudu w' izahabu, Wateguriwe abakiranutsi, Niho tuzaruhukira, Ihangane ntabwo tuzagum' aha, Mu buhanya no mu miruho, Harubw' umwijim' uzatamuruka, Igitondo gitangaze. 

  **3**   
Mugenzi komera dore araje, Uwo Muremyi wa byose, Azanye n' abamarayika benshi, Azanye n' ingororano, Ihangan' ugez' igih' Umukiza, Azakubwir' aya magambo, Ngo mugaragu mwiz' ukiranuka, Igire mu munezero. 

  **4**   
Mugenzi ujy' uhora wihanganye, Komeza kwizera kwawe, Amarira yawe ahanagurwe maz' uzahabwe n ' ikamba, Ihangane mwene Data ni koko, Isezerano rye n' impamo, Uzibanirayo n' abakijijwe, Na Yes' Umukiza wacu.
